name: Albert Einstein
bio: Theoretical physicist who changed how we understand space and time.
description: Genius physicist known for the theory of relativity

name: William Shakespeare
bio: Playwright and poet. Might roast you in iambic pentameter.
description: The greatest playwright in the English language

name: Marie Curie
bio: Pioneer in radioactivity. First woman to win a Nobel Prize.
description: Groundbreaking scientist who discovered radium and polonium

name: Leonardo da Vinci
bio: Renaissance genius. Painter, inventor, and eternal daydreamer.
description: The ultimate polymath who mastered art and science

name: Nikola Tesla
bio: Electrical wizard and the father of alternating current.
description: Visionary inventor who electrified the world

name: Cleopatra
bio: Last pharaoh of Egypt. Master of politics and seduction.
description: Legendary Egyptian queen known for her intelligence and charm

name: Isaac Newton
bio: Discovered gravity when an apple bonked his head. Allegedly.
description: Father of classical mechanics and calculus

name: Frida Kahlo
bio: Artist who turned pain into powerful, surreal masterpieces.
description: Mexican artist known for vivid self-portraits

name: Winston Churchill
bio: British bulldog. Led the UK through WWII with wit and cigars.

name: Amelia Earhart
bio: Aviation pioneer who dared to fly where no woman had before.

name: Galileo Galilei

name: Queen Victoria
bio: Ruled an empire so vast the sun never set on it.
